name: Backend Bruno
description:
I should've quit my job a long time ago!

Bruno is a backend developer for a boring business based in Toronto. He gets paid a pretty penny, gets the best benefits, and has a wonderful work-life balance. He has almost zero complaints about his career… except for his two-faced front-end colleagues who take all of the glory from his work! You wouldn’t even want to unionize with them at that point. Besides, corporations always have your best interest in mind.

Unfortunately for Bruno, he’s about to get a little too much of the spotlight. Transported into a digital dimension while asleep at his desk, Bruno is now the main character in his own nightmare. Will the 9 years of previous programming experience help Bruno to survive the horde? Why is that even an entry requirement? What is wrong with people in general? Let’s find out.

Eliminate zombies to earn points. Use points to progress your skill tree, buy items, or upgrade your firepower.

Use explosives to propel yourself towards the sky, mow down zombies from above, and access new areas.

Collect a wide variety of camo patterns (including light-emitting and animated camos) to apply to your upgraded weapons.

Learn more about how you got here, and earn powerful gear along the way.

Grab a loadout and mow down zombies. From pistols to grenade launchers, your arsenal can be impressive—for the right price.

Creators:

Backend Bruno was created by two high school students:

- Justin Lin

- Yax Patel
